content: प्रमद् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To be intoxicated or drunk. {@--2@} To be careless about, to be negligent or heedless, be regardless of or indifferent to (with <ab>loc.</ab>); अतोऽर्थान्न प्रमाद्यंति प्रमदासु विपश्चितः <ls>Ms. 2. 213.</ls> {@--3@} To omit to do, swerve or deviate from (with <ab>abl.</ab>) स्वाधिकारात्प्रमत्तः <ls>Me. 1.</ls> {@--4@} To make a mistake, err, go astray; <ls>Bk. 5. 8</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">17. 39</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">18. 8.</ls> {@--5@} To spend or while a way (time).
